numbered_ace_sentences: 1. People who are between the 70th percentile and the 90th percentile are not average.
2. The legacy status is more likely to be accepted.
3. The legacy status provides an advantage.
4. I am curious how the graph might vary depending on the year when the graph was created.
5. I am curious why the income 10th percentile is above normal.
6. I am curious why the income 75th percentile is below normal.
7. I am curious why the income 90th percentile is below normal.
8. In our area, there are not many extremely wealthy people.
9. Roughly 99.5% of people in our area are not extremely wealthy.
10. I believe that admission into a prestigious institution requires a high level of education.
11. I believe that admission into a prestigious institution requires a high level of intelligence.
12. Not many people have parents who attended elite schools in the past.
13. I ask whether the rate of admittance increases with income.
